channel.title: Webcam Drivers for My Fucking Robot
channel.description:
http://hp.microinv.com/details.cfm?id=PG088AA
This is my fucking model of webcam that I can use with my fucking robot. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,303811.0.html <-my robot
PG088AA
I cannot find any WORKING drivers for it. Google has failed me numerous times, and today is no exception. Here are my leads:
http://mytecexp.blogspot.com/2008/03/pg088aa-para-windows-vista.html ^I tried this with no luck, because I have XP running on the eeepc.
I don't know how to modify cab files or any of that crap. A stupid 40mb download with no files inside. Just great.
Whoever helps me with this will get uber credits after the completion of my robot and 2.5 internets (half because I need a bit for myself)
YES, I DID RTFM. No, this isn't my webcam, and the owner lost their CD. I'd never buy anything from HP.

item.title: Webcam Drivers for My Fucking Robot
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:11, topic:233780”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=308282.msg2485601#msg2485601 date=1223784315]
Pfft… My really rare chinese phone worked instantly as a webcam when I plugged it into my computer.
[/quote]

You shouldn’t be proud of a chinese phone tbh.[/quote]
Had it for six months… Now I have a new phone. I was just saying that if a rare chinese phone works instantly as a web cam, they can’t be hard to find drivers for.

Read full topic
item.source: Webcam Drivers for My Fucking Robot
